main event: On October 7, 1969, a bright, disc-shaped object was observed over Chicago, Illinois, hovering and emitting a pulsating light before suddenly accelerating out of sight.
interesting points: Multiple witnesses reported seeing the object, which exhibited unusual flight characteristics., The event was classified under Project Blue Book case number 7445037., The estimated size of the object was about 75-100 feet in diameter., Witnesses described the object's movement as erratic, making sudden changes in direction and speed., No radar contact was established for the object during the sighting.
sighted object: bright, disc-shaped object emitting a pulsating light
witness description: The witnesses included a civilian employee and a taxi driver who saw the object while engaged in their respective activities.
